project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that converts temperatures among Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin as specified by the user.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Create the command-line interface for user input
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
